name: Florentine Chicken Alfredo with Alfredo Sauce
ingredients: 1 ounce fresh spinach, cut into thin strips *
3 ounces parmesan cheese, grated or shredded

instructions.en: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill the chicken and keep warm.
In a skillet, saut√© mushrooms in 2 tablespoons butter until tender. Set aside.
For the Alfredo sauce: In a medium saucepan, melt 4 tablespoons butter over low heat.
Add garlic, pepper, and cream to the saucepan. Simmer for about 2 minutes.
Simmer for 10 minutes until sauce has thickened and cheese has melted.
Very gradually whisk in mozzarella cheese, whisking constantly.
Add cooked mushrooms and spinach strips to the Alfredo sauce.
Heat over very low heat until spinach has wilted. Add water if sauce is too thick.
Serve the sauce over the grilled chicken.

notes: * You'll need about 1 2/3 cups 'confetti' sized strips (chiffonade) of spinach. This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze/Does not reheat well.
